response.original_title: Rob Sims Presents Fit Models Totally Exposed: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker Vol.1
response.overview: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker was filmed in one of the world's most notorious nest of unashamed sexual immorality: The Hedonist II nudist resort in Negril, Jamaica. This footage is completely uninhibited, unscripted and unbelievable! Between the cut-throat card games, the girls roll around the waves and on the sand, stripping down, and posing in some of the most erotic photo shoots you'll ever see. Watch these girls play together - untying each other's straps in a variety of steaming hot photo shoots. Normally, what happens at Hedonism II stays in Hedonism II, but the Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker were caught acting out with all the self-indulgence and sexual wildness that Hedonism II strives to keep confidential. These girls are willing to do anything it takes to achieve a stimulating pose, even if it means a little fondling.  Featured Models: Megan Devoe, Kristen Jackson, Loretta Lynn and Leilene.
response.title: Rob Sims Presents Fit Models Totally Exposed: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker Vol.1
